bug.title: When an account is edited, its color is lost
bug.description:
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour 1. Set the color of an account 2. Edit the account. 3. Press save
#### Expected behaviour The color of the account remains the same.
#### Actual behaviour The color is unset.
#### Software specifications * GnuCash Android version: 2.1.3 * System Android version: 5.0 * Device type: bq Aquaris E4
